resources.string: BSC IT application is an one stop solution for all BSC IT(Bachelor os Science in Information Technology) students as well as students who wish to pursue BSC IT
Get universities notes and reference books for all subjects semester wise. You can view online or download PDF files.
Get latest syllabus of every year provided by the university.
Get PDFs of last 2-3 year University Question Papers organized semester wised. View online or download.
Get Question Banks for every subjects semester wise for practice.
You can view or download the latest time table of Theory and Practical examination of Mumbai University.
Get practicals lab notes for every subjects semester wise.
Get access to different video lectures on different topics anytime.
Expand your knowledge in the world of IT by reading latest blogs on different technologies.
